Name: Creole Contentment
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: If using a sweeter Madeira such as Verdelho/Rainwater (medium dry) or Bual (medium sweet) you'll need to adjust this finely balanced cocktail. Even Baker himself says it "needs a little trimming". However, dry Sercial Madeira works best to produce a finely balanced complex cocktail.
History: Adapted from Charles H. Baker's 1939 The Gentlemen's Companion .
Nutrition: One serving of Creole Contentment contains 161 calories
